mapper.select: SELECT b.income, b.expend, b.id, b.create_time AS date FROM bill b WHERE b.user_id = 1 AND b.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND b.create_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT bd.create_time AS date, p.`name`, bd.num, bd.price, bd.bill_type, bd.balance FROM bill_detail bd LEFT JOIN product p ON bd.product_id = p.id WHERE bd.bill_id = 1 AND bd.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE( #{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND bd.create_time <= STR_TO_DATE( #{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) GROUP BY DAY (bd.create_time) ORDER BY bd.create_time DESC;
